text: @JohnHor14418049 @CllrTKerr @joe_black1509 Herd immunity requires a vaccine. The other countries are doing well because they locked down early & people took it seriously. We've been moaning about pubs, football & haircuts since day one. We're still gubbed because "how dare these rules apply to me".
